gwt.g2d.client.input
Class InputManager<T extends com.google.gwt.event.shared.HasHandlers>

java.lang.Object
  gwt.g2d.client.input.InputManager<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
KeyboardManager, MouseManager
public abstract class InputManager<T extends com.google.gwt.event.shared.HasHandlers>
extends java.lang.Object

Interface for defining a manager that manages an input device, allowing the user to query the state of the input device at each point in time without the use of a handler or listener.

Author:
hao1300@gmail.com

Constructor Detail

InputManager

public InputManager()
Method Detail

manage

public abstract void manage(T obj)
Let this InputManager manages the given object's input state. A InputManager can only manages one object at a time. To manage a different object, call unmanage() first.

Parameters:
obj -

unmanage

public abstract void unmanage()
Unmanages the managed object. If no object is being managed, then calling this should have no effect.

setPreventDefault

public void setPreventDefault(boolean preventDefault)
Sets whether or not to prevent the default action from taking place. true if the default action is to be prevented. Default: false.

Parameters:
preventDefault -

isPreventDefault

public boolean isPreventDefault()
Gets whether or not to prevent the default action from taking place.
